title: a few SGC graded and a raw Mathewson dark cap FS
author: dcost328

posts.post_title: a few SGC graded and a raw Mathewson dark cap FS
posts.post_content:
may be headed to the UK at the weekend so if no deal is struck may have to try again in a few months.

hard to get a good scan of these because the scanner doesnt shut all the way. anyway, here they are.
